A

add(image) - Method in class io.scanbot.sdk.persistence.PageFileStorage
Adds original image in the storage, and returns pageId. Creates previews, and doesn't detect contours.
add(image) - Method in class io.scanbot.sdk.persistence.PageFileStorage
Adds original image in the storage, and returns pageId. Creates previews, and doesn't detect contours.
addImageFileFormatExtension(addImageFileFormatExtension) - Method in class io.scanbot.sdk.persistence.PageStorageSettings.Builder
Sets image file format extension, which will be used by Scanbot framework enum CameraImageFormat If true - ".png" or ".jpg" extension will be added to the image file name, otherwise - files are without format extensions. By default true.
addResultHandler(handler) - Method in class io.scanbot.sdk.barcode.BarcodeDetectorFrameHandler
Registers result handler which will be notified about barcode/QR code detection results.
addResultPoints(newPoints) - Method in class io.scanbot.sdk.barcode.entity.BarcodeItem
 
applyFilter(page, filter) - Method in class io.scanbot.sdk.process.PageProcessor
Applies an image filter on given page based on the existing unfiltered document image. The filtered image result will be stored as document image of the page. The current document image of the page will be overwritten. The original image of the page will not be modified.
attach(cameraView, scanbotSDK) - Method in class io.scanbot.sdk.barcode.BarcodeDetectorFrameHandler.Companion
Convenience method for creating new class BarcodeDetectorFrameHandler and adding it as PreviewBuffer.FrameHandler to given camera view.

Convenience method for creating new class SilentBarcodeDetectorFrameHandler and adding it as PreviewBuffer.FrameHandler to given camera view.

cropAndRotate(page, times, polygon) - Method in class io.scanbot.sdk.process.PageProcessor
Crops the polygon from the original image and rotates all images (and previews) of the given page x times. The original image is required, other images (document, unfiltered document) are optional. The direction of rotation is counterclockwise if the times value is positive and clockwise if times value is negative (e.g. -2 = rotates 2 times to the right).

detectDocument(page) - Method in class io.scanbot.sdk.process.PageProcessor
Performs document detection on the original image of given page. The page must have the original image. Creates and stored the document (cropped) image file based on document detection result (polygon) and optionally defined filter in the page object.

rotate(page, times) - Method in class io.scanbot.sdk.process.PageProcessor
Rotates all images (and previews) of the given page x times. The original image is required, other images (document, unfiltered document) are optional. The direction of rotation is counterclockwise if the times value is positive and clockwise if times value is negative (e.g. -2 = rotates 2 times to the right).

setImageScale(imageScale) - Method in class io.scanbot.sdk.ui.view.camera.configuration.DocumentScannerConfiguration
The image scaling factor. The factor must be within the 0..1 range. A factor of 1 means that the resulting images retain their original size. When the factor is less than 1, resulting images will be made smaller by that factor. By default the scale is 1.
setImageScale(imageScale) - Method in class io.scanbot.sdk.ui.view.workflow.configuration.WorkflowScannerConfiguration
The image scaling factor. The factor must be within the 0..1 range. A factor of 1 means that the resulting images retain their original size. When the factor is less than 1, resulting images will be made smaller by that factor. By default the scale is 1.
